properties.entry: Generation bugfix. Hud options and in-game toggle hotkey with 6 preset locations. (Sneak + hotkey to toggle "ZeldaHud" as well.) Bonus UU recipes. Info: http://bit.ly/dartPost
Bugfixes. Update notification will now only show once per version. API has been fixed.
Removed dependency on custom enchanting block. Refactored API to be more useful.
